admin.bot-channel.set-success: Done! {CHANNEL} is now set as the bot-command channel.
admin.bot-channel.clear-success: Done! {CHANNEL} is unset as the bot-command channel.
admin.bot-channel.info-desc: In the bot-command channel, anyone can use bot commands without cool-down.
admin.bot-channel.error-clear: Error: no channel is set as the bot-command channel.
admin.bot-channel.error-set: Error: {CHANNEL} is already the bot-command channel.
admin.bot-channel.command-hint: View, set, or reset the bot-command channel
admin.bot-channel.info-hint: Show information about the bot-command channel

admin.say.message-sent: The message has been sent: {MESSAGE URL}
admin.say.command-hint: Send a message through the bot
admin.say.channel-hint: Channel where the message should be sent

admin.reply.command-hint: Reply to a message through the bot
admin.reply.message-id-hint: Id of the message to reply to
admin.reply.response-hint: Response message that I should send

admin.prefix.set-success: Done! {PREFIX} is now set as the command prefix.
admin.prefix.command-hint: View or set the bot-command prefix
admin.prefix.error-zero-length: Error: command prefix cannot have zero length.
